api
Interface SuccessorTask<T>

All Superinterfaces:
Task<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
EuclideanTspSuccessorTask, FibonacciSuccessorTask, MandelbrotSetSuccessorTask
public interface SuccessorTask<T>
extends Task<T>

Models any Successor task that can be executed on a remote Compute Engine. A successor Task is the one which collects the results of the tasks and composes into an intermediate Solution. A successor may return the results to its parent successor who will wait on this successor for the results.

Author:
Vijayaraghavan Subbaiah
